      • Polynomial

        public Polynomial(int terms)
        Polynomial: determines the size of the polynomial
        Parameters:
        terms - the size of the array coef
        Precondition:
        term > 0
        Postcondition:
        array coef has the size of term.

    • Method Detail

      • assign_coef

        public void assign_coef(double new_coefficient,
                        int k)
        assign_coef: assign a value to a specific index
        Parameters:
        new_coefficient, - k new_coefficient is the value assigned and k is the index of array where the value is in.
        Precondition:
        k >= 0 and largest k is one less than array length
        Postcondition:
        the array coef has a value in some or all of its' indices.

        Returns:
